title: Biden's hitting Russia's yacht-riding rich with sanctions. Will it blunt Putin's Ukraine invasion?
description: Biden a number of Russian oligarchs with sanctions. But it needs to hit more of them and harder, U.S. officials and kleptocracy experts said.
content:
• Biden has sanctioned a number of Russian oligarchs as well as their family.
  • But kleptocracy experts and lawmakers say more needs to be done to rein in Putin.
